statements: SELECT * FROM survey_data
SELECT survey_question, survey_response FROM survey_data WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT DISTINCT survey_question FROM survey_data
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(*) as num_responses FROM survey_data GROUP BY participant_id HAVING num_responses > 2
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT survey_question, survey_response FROM survey_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(*) AS response_count FROM survey_data GROUP BY participant_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_question FROM survey_data ORDER BY survey_question;
SELECT * FROM survey_data WHERE survey_question LIKE '%satisfaction%' AND survey_response = 'Positive' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT name, age FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, gender FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT participant_id, question, answer FROM survey_responses WHERE participant_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM participants WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM participants WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT DISTINCT age FROM participants WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT p.name, s.question FROM participants p JOIN survey_responses s ON p.id = s.participant_id WHERE s.answer='Yes';
SELECT * FROM survey_participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM survey_participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Female';
SELECT response_id, survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_responses WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM survey_questions ORDER BY question_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male';
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM survey_participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC;
SELECT participant_name, survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_participants INNER JOIN survey_responses ON survey_participants.participant_id = survey_responses.participant_id;
SELECT participant_id, question_text, question_category FROM survey_questions WHERE question_category = 'Health';
SELECT * FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_age > 30 ORDER BY participant_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, participation_date FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM responses WHERE participant_id = 2;
SELECT question_text FROM questions WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM responses WHERE participant_id = 2 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM questions WHERE survey_id = 4 AND question_id > 2;
SELECT participant_name, participation_date FROM participants WHERE participation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT participant_id, email FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT survey_id, survey_name FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT survey_name, description FROM surveys WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50;

SELECT responses.response_id, participants.name, surveys.survey_name, questions.question_text, survey_results.result FROM responses JOIN participants ON responses.participant_id = participants.participant_id JOIN surveys ON responses.survey_id = surveys.survey_id JOIN questions ON responses.question_id = questions.question_id JOIN survey_results ON responses.response_id = survey_results.response_id;

SELECT surveys.survey_name, AVG(CAST(survey_results.result AS DECIMAL)) AS average_result FROM surveys JOIN survey_results ON surveys.survey_id = survey_results.survey_id GROUP BY surveys.survey_name HAVING AVG(CAST(survey_results.result AS DECIMAL)) > 3;
